item.title: Meta 的互联世界梦想在红海受阻
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Riley Griffin 报道 Meta 的 2Africa 水下电缆项目完工受阻的问题。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports on the issues stalling the completion of Meta’s 2Africa undersea cable project.】

item.title: Uber 与 Starship 合作，开始在欧洲提供机器人送货服务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. 将通过与 Starship 科技公司（Starship Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. will offer sidewalk robot deliveries in Europe for the first time through a new partnership with Starship Technologies Inc., starting with parts of the UK in December.】

item.title: 世界经济如何转向支离破碎的全球化
item.description: 虽然全球经济正在分化，但许多商业领域依然相互交织【原文：While the global economy is fragmenting, many areas of commerce remain intertwined】

item.title: 米莱伊不顾投资者呼吁增加阿根廷外汇储备
item.description: 尽管投资者的呼声很高，但阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱和他的顾问们对迅速建立储备、让比索浮动和放松货币管制犹豫不决。【原文：Despite a chorus of calls from investors, Argentine President Javier Milei and his advisers are hesitant to rapidly build reserves, let the peso float and relax currency controls.】

item.title: TCS 数据中心业务获 TPG 10 亿美元投资
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务公司（Tata Consultancy Services）在一份声明中说，该公司为其人工智能数据中心业务 HyperVault 从私募股权集团 TPG 募集了 10 亿美元。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services raised $1 billion from private equity group TPG for its AI data center business HyperVault, the firm said in a statement.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 因需求疲软和关税问题下调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: Bath & Body Works Inc.下调了全年业绩展望，称疲软的消费情绪损害了购物者的消费意愿，以及美国和其他国家征收关税的预期影响。【原文：Bath & Body Works Inc. cut its full-year outlook, saying weak consumer sentiment is hurting shoppers’ willingness to spend and the expected impact of tariffs imposed by the US and other countries.】

item.title: 2008 年以来最大规模的天然气管道建设推动了特朗普的能源政策
item.description: 美国南部正在掀起近 20 年来最大的天然气管道热潮，各家公司正在建设天然气管道系统，为墨西哥湾沿岸崛起的大型出口终端输送天然气。【原文：The biggest natural gas pipeline boom in nearly 20 years is unfolding in the US South as companies build systems to feed massive export terminals rising along the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰 "赚钱机器 "在私人信用裂缝面前一筹莫展
item.description: 近年来，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s Craig Packer has been something of a mainstay on the New York Stock Exchange in recent years, ringing the opening bell multiple times to toast the private credit giant’s public funds.】

item.title: 默克集团与 Valo 公司达成 30 亿美元交易，利用人工智能治疗帕金森病
item.description: 德国科学集团默克公司（Merck KGaA）将利用 Valo Health 公司的人工智能平台，帮助发现和开发帕金森病及相关疾病的治疗方法，这项合作交易的价值可能超过 30 亿美元。【原文：Merck KGaA, a German science group, will use Valo Health Inc.’s AI platform to help discover and develop treatments for Parkinson’s disease and related disorders, in a partnership deal that could be worth more than $3 billion.】

item.title: LME将停止基准铂金和钯金拍卖
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所将从明年年中开始停止管理每天两次的铂金和钯金基准价格拍卖，因为它将把重点放在其核心基本金属产品上。【原文：The London Metal Exchange will stop administering twice-daily auctions that set benchmark platinum and palladium prices from the middle of next year, as it focuses on its core base metals offering.】

item.title: 西门子能源计划回购 60 亿欧元股票
item.description: 在数据中心投资激增的乐观预期下，西门子能源公司宣布了自这家涡轮机制造商五年前上市以来最大规模的股票回购。【原文：Siemens Energy AG announced its biggest share buyback since the turbine maker went public five years ago amid optimism around surging data-center investments.】

item.title: OpenAI 时代将老派股票分析师推向私人市场
item.description: OpenAI 等私营公司的影响力与日俱增，正促使华尔街重新划分股票研究业务的界限。【原文：The growing clout of private companies like OpenAI is causing Wall Street to redraw the boundaries of its equity research business.】

item.title: 德国联邦银行称德国第四季度有望实现增长
item.description: 德国联邦银行称，随着美国关税造成的波动减弱，德国经济可能在今年最后三个月恢复增长。【原文：Germany’s economy may return to growth in the final three months of the year as the volatility created by US tariffs subsides, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 贝恩预测 2026 年奢侈品市场将恢复增长
item.description: 据全球最大的咨询公司之一称，个人奢侈品市场在经历了两年的平缓增长后，将于 2026 年恢复增长。【原文：The market for personal luxury goods should return to growth in 2026 after two years of flatlining, according to one of the world’s biggest consulting firms.】

item.title: 马腾博士警告美国关税打击，计划转移生产
item.description: 马腾斯博士公司（Dr. Martens Plc）正在将部分鞋类产品的生产从老挝转移到越南，以减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税影响。【原文：Dr. Martens Plc is moving production of some of its footwear from Laos to Vietnam in a bid to mitigate the effect of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 投资者转向就业报告，英伟达重启人工智能涨势
item.description:
强于预期的就业数据可能使降息希望破灭。【原文：

Stronger-than-expected jobs reading could dash hopes for rate cut.

】

item.title: 企业内部人士以五月份以来最快速度购买股票
item.description: 自 4 月份以来最糟糕的股市行情引发了市场上最了解情况的一群人--企业内部人士--的疯狂购买。【原文：The worst run for stocks since April has sparked a buying spree among one of the markets’ most informed cohort: corporate insiders.】

item.title: 巴菲特对 Alphabet 的祝福让估值悖论重新成为焦点
item.description: 就在六个月前，Alphabet 公司的投资者还担心该公司会成为人工智能革命的牺牲品。但在经历了数万亿美元的涨势后，这些担忧发生了转变，现在人们最担心的是，这只股票是否会因为自身利益而变得过于昂贵。【原文：Just six months ago, Alphabet Inc. investors feared the company could be a casualty of the artificial intelligence revolution. But after a trillion-dollar rally those concerns have flipped, and now the biggest worry is if the stock is getting too expensive for its own good.】

item.title: <strong>YouTube右翼明星助推政治性广告热潮</strong
item.description:
YouTube 的 MAGA 明星不仅谈论政治，而且还在推销政治

。【原文：

YouTube’s MAGA stars aren’t just talking politics—they’re selling it

】

item.title: 如果中国停止向日本出口稀土，习近平将面临全球反弹的风险
item.description: 从警告游客到停止海鲜进口，中国在惩罚日本首相高市真奈发表的将台湾冲突与国家安全挂钩的言论时遵循了一套老套路。但是，有一种武器仍被束之高阁，那就是稀土。【原文：From warning tourists to halting seafood imports, China has followed a well-worn playbook in punishing Japan for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s remarks linking a Taiwan conflict to her country’s security. But one weapon remains conspicuously holstered: rare earths.】

item.title: 私募基金 7000 亿美元入侵保险业为退休人员带来新风险
item.description: 私募股权公司正在利用保险公司的资金来推动他们的交易，这引发了人们对美国退休人员的储蓄正面临新风险的担忧。【原文：Private equity firms are using insurers’ money to drive their deals, raising concerns that US retirees’ savings are being exposed to new risks.】

item.title: Makhlouf 告诉路透社，欧洲央行的行动需要非常有力的证据
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）在接受路透社采访时表示，他对当前的政策立场感到满意，并警告说不要对潜在的通胀下行做出过度反应。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said he’s comfortable with the current policy stance and warned against overreacting to a potential inflation undershoot, according to an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 浑水公司的卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）说，现在不是做空大型科技公司的时候
item.description: 做空者卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）认为，现在还不是押注美国最大科技公司的时候，即使人们对人工智能的潜在泡沫发出了越来越多的警告。【原文：It’s not the time to bet against the biggest US technology names, according to short-seller Carson Block, even as warnings rise about a potential bubble in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 英国将在预算案公布后额外增售 90 亿英镑债券
item.description: 在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）寻求在下周公布预算案，使英国债务走上可持续发展道路之际，债券交易商正准备通过出售金边债券筹集比之前宣布的更多资金，从而加大对英国政府的压力。【原文：Bond traders are bracing for the UK government to raise more funds through gilt sales than previously announced, upping the pressure on Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves as she seeks to deliver a budget next week that puts the country’s debt on a sustainable path.】

item.title: 南非总统为期待已久的艾芬豪铂金矿揭幕
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）为艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）期待已久的铂金矿揭幕，距勘探开始已有四分之一个世纪。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa opened Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.’s long-awaited platinum mine, a quarter-century after exploration began.】

item.title: 据说 ICICI Prudential Asset 已接近获得 11 亿美元首次公开募股的批准
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，ICICI Prudential 资产管理公司即将获得印度证券监管机构的上市批准，这为印度今年最大的首次公开募股之一的启动铺平了道路。【原文：ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co. is close to securing approval from India’s securities regulator to go public, according to people familiar with the matter, paving the way for one of the country’s biggest initial public offerings this year to kick off.】

item.title: Inditex 创始人奥尔特加购买亚马逊在温哥华租赁的大厦
item.description: Inditex SA 的亿万富翁创始人阿曼西奥-奥尔特加（Amancio Ortega）已同意购买位于温哥华市中心的邮政大楼（The Post building）。【原文：Amancio Ortega, the billionaire founder of Inditex SA, has agreed to buy The Post building in downtown Vancouver, a two-tower complex leased to Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 沃达康正洽谈增持价值 90 亿美元的肯尼亚电信巨头股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沃达康集团有限公司正在与肯尼亚商谈收购政府持有的 Safaricom Ltd. 部分股份的可能性。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd. is in talks with Kenya about potentially acquiring part of the government’s stake in Safaricom Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Kretinsky 的 EP 基础设施公司在全面交易后出售债务
item.description: EP Infrastructure, a.s.（EPIF）在向道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）出售其控股公司的股份后，将于本周四寻求通过绿色债券筹集至少 5 亿欧元资金。【原文：EP Infrastructure, a.s. (EPIF) is seeking to raise at least €500 million from a green bond on Thursday, after selling a stake in its holding company to TotalEnergies SE.】

item.title: <strong>泰勒-考恩谈人工智能尚未改变世界的原因</strong
item.description:
重大革命的障碍

The barriers to a major revolution

】
